name: Sleazy Adventure
overview: A friend of yours has just bought a sailboat, but it is in Thailand at present. You agree to sail it back, knowing that you can use it to import contraband. The more valuables you try to bring back home, the greater the risk. The player must explore the streets of Bangkok looking for illicit goods including: a golden Buddha statue, "incense", and ebony. These are acquired by solving a number of puzzles. These must then be carefully hidden aboard your friend's boat and sailed back to America. There, the player is met by a number of people interested in purchasing, or arresting you for your cargo. There is no save or restore feature. All commands are via VERB NOUN text entry.
